Title: Premium Battle Pass
Description:
Purchase the Echoes Within Premium Battle Pass now to immediately unlock the “Redsteel Splinter” coating for all current armor cores as well as bonus Match XP throughout Season 3!  

Featuring over 100 rewards to unlock, including 1,000 Halo Credits, the Echoes Within Premium Battle Pass also offers players an additional Challenge Slot to turbo-charge your progression whenever you have this Battle Pass equipped.
